sentence.Network_en: He described the situation as very dangerous and called for resolute action.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将形势描述得非常危险，并号召采取果断行动。

sentence.Network_en: Voters perceive him as a decisive and resolute international leader.
sentence.Network_cn: 投票者认为他是一位坚定果断的国际领导人。

sentence.Network_en: He became even more resolute in his opposition to the plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 他更加坚决地反对这个计划。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'paid', describing a rent): from Latin resolutus 'loosened, released, paid', past participle of resolvere (see resolve)

entry.def: If you describe someone as resolute, you approve of them because they are very determined not to change their mind or not to give up a course of action.

example.ex: Voters perceive him as a decisive and resolute international leader...
example.tran: 投票者认为他是一位坚定果断的国际领导人。

example.ex: He described the situation as very dangerous and called for resolute action.
example.tran: 他将形势描述得非常危险，并号召采取果断行动。

means.word_mean: 1. firm in purpose or belief; characterized by firmness and determination;

auth_sentence.content: Committed and resolute as others around him wilted.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Committed and resolute as others around him wilted.

auth_sentence.content: He is staring straight ahead a picture of resolute confidence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+solu溶解,解决,松开+te→adj.坚决的,果断的
solu溶解,解决,松开+able可以……的→soluble可溶的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 绝对的,完全的;确实的,肯定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab相反,不+solu溶解,解决,松开+te→绝不松开的→绝对的
ab离开+solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→松开后离开
dis分开+solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→松开分散→解散
solu溶解,解决,松开+te→n.溶解物, 溶质

stems_affixes.value_cn: 解答,解决办法;溶解,溶液
stems_affixes.word_buile: solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→n.解答,解决办法;溶解,溶液

sentences.en: He was resolute in carrying out his plan.
sentences.cn: 他坚决地实行他的计划。
